title: TM4C123G and C Data Structures
text:
Throughout this class you will be heavily using the textbook (Practical Microcontroller Engineering with ARM Technology, by Ying Bai) and the TM4C123G datasheet as a reference to learn about and design systems using the TMG4C123G microcontroller. The TM4C123G datasheet can be found on the course website here: http://class.ece.iastate.edu/cpre288/resources.asp

Online Reading: Read Section 2.3: Introduction to Computers.

Textbook Reading: Read Section 2.6.1 - 2.6.2.


Answer the following questions using the textbook and/or datasheet.
